original: Pepper & Carrot Episode 13: The Pyjama Party

This will be a line-by-line translation of the comic. Some of the episodes already have translations, but there's usually always something to improve. For the rest, the goal is to have all episodes translated at some point.
Pepper&Carrot is a webcomic by David Revoy, ww.davidrevoy.com - it is published under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 licence
[Coriander] I hope you're not too intimidated by my staff.
[Pepper] No, don't worry, they're very welcoming, we feel right at home.
[Shichimi] I'm really impressed with the interior decoration...
[Shichimi] ... so refined and cosy at the same time!
[Coriander] ... sometimes I find it all so ...
[Shichimi] I'd love to live in this kind of comfort,
[Pepper] It's like something my godmothers would say!
[Coriander] Come on girls, let's concentrate, we're almost at the end!
[Pepper] You have to admit, this quest is super easy...
[Pepper] ... and we haven't even started to...
[Coriander] ...Oh no! It's too late! she... she's...
[Pepper] I know you're only trying to defend me...
[Pepper] ... but there's no need, we're only playing!
[Credits] 11/2015 - Art & Scenario: David Revoy Translation: Alex Gryson
